resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105844</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105844</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Edison Invents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Edison Erfindet</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Edison Invente</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Edison Inventa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Edison Inventa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Θ*Εδησον Invents</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Edison Inventa</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines several of his inventions?the telegraph, telephone, phonograph, and electric light bulb. Students learn about his life and how to create their own light bulb.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft mehrere seines inventions?the 
Fernschreibers, Telefons, Plattenspielers und Lichtbirne. 
Kursteilnehmer erlernen über seine Lebensdauer und wie man ihre
eigene Glühlampe herstellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine plusieurs de son télégraphe 
d'inventions?the, téléphone, phonographe, et ampoule électrique. 
Les étudiants se renseignent sur sa vie et comment créer leur 
propre ampoule.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina diversos de seus telégrafo do 
inventions?the, telefone, fonógrafo, e bulbo claro elétrico. 
Os estudantes aprendem sobre sua vida e como criar seu próprio 
bulbo claro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina varie del suoi telegrafo del 
inventions?the, telefono, fonografo e lampadina elettrica. Gli 
allievi imparano circa la sua vita e come creare la loro propria 
lampadina.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει αρκετών από τον τηλέγραφο inventions?the, 
το τηλέφωνο, το φωνογράφο, και τον ηλεκτρικό ελαφρύ βολβό του. 
Οι σπουδαστές μαθαίνουν για τη ζωή του και πώς να 
δημιουργήσουν τον ελαφρύ βολβό τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina varios de su telégrafo del 
inventions?the, teléfono, fonógrafo, y bulbo de la luz eléctrica. 
Los estudiantes aprenden sobre su vida y cómo crear su propia 
bombilla.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206790</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105844</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/edison-invents</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
